mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND tagging_id = #{taggingId} AND is_valid = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_favorite(user_id, tagging_id, is_valid) VALUES (#{userId}, #{taggingId}, "Y")
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND tagging_id = #{taggingId} AND is_valid = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT t.tagging_id, t.video_src, t.video_title, t.video_content, t.video_like FROM t_favorite f JOIN t_tagging t ON f.tagging_id = t.tagging_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.is_valid = 'Y';
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tagging SET video_like = CASE WHEN video_like > 0 THEN video_like - 1 ELSE video_like END WHERE tagging_id = #{taggingId}
